event-group.description: Types of hallucinations the frog will have on collecting rainbow mushroom.
event-group.title: MUSHROOM - RAINBOW

sub-events.comment: Collect the Rocket and launch it setting CountDown
Counting the time down:EverySecond substract 1 from rocketcountdown if it was set
Use left and right arrow keys to control the Frog or tilt the mobile.
Disable Platform behavior when travelling on Rocket
Pin Rocket and move some distance everytick
When rocket time out,Re-Enable the platform behaviour and destroy the rocket.
Spawn Mushroom_Inv randomly
Collecting mushroom and setting the status
Activate Mushroom on falling(acheived by decreasing the gravity),show a Mushroom to frog
De-Activate the mushroom on landed
Reset the gravity and when mushroom de-Activated
Collecting shield and destroying it
Collecting the powerups and showing that Power on Attack button (zoom in effects to grab the atention of the player)
Doublejump by increaing the jump strength for one jump
Collect the health

event-group.description: Counter is used to avoid accidental activation of powertUp
event-group.title: Touch Time Counter For ATTACK BUTTON

sub-events.comment: Activate the available power when touching the Attack Button
Destroy the power at the end of touch or if the powerup time exceeds
Zoom effect for Attack button when player using the power
Destroying the power after Time exceeded
While Sage power is using Just disable the Platform behaviour and move froggie in upward direction
When frog is falling to death destroy the power up frog has to avoid frog to use power such as sage

event-group.description: Showing Unlocked PowerUps according to the PowerupAnimMax depending on currentworld

sub-events.comment: When Hitman animation is playing always set the froggie not mirrored otheerwise the bullets directions changes since the imagepoints becomes mirrored
